DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the effect of steady-state itraconazole on the pharmacokinetics of steady-state of faldaprevir and the effect of steady-state of faldaprevir on the single-dose pharmacokinetics of atorvastatin as well as the effect of steady-state of faldaprevir on the single-dose pharmacokinetics of rosuvastatin
DOC.brief_title: Investigation of Interactions Between Faldaprevir, Itraconazole, Atorvastatin and Rosuvastatin
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. Healthy male and female subjects Exclusion criteria: 1. Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
